channel.title: I need to know how to get a no-ip and also why is it so popular?
channel.description:
Why is no-ip more popular then hamachi?
Please dont call me a newby or anything i just simply wanna know so if i know which one is greater ill use it i currently have hamachi but if no-ip is better then i might change to no-ip, i truly think hamacahi is more popular because people will remember your network and they can chat to you when it's offline or online or ask you questions or tell you if it's crashed, but i dont know why hamachi is so much more popular :| and if you think no-ip is better please post the site or how to get it below were everyone else talks, please post in here thank you very much
-shadow hearts.

Please dont call me a newby or anything i just simply wanna know so if i know which one is greater ill use it i currently have hamachi but if no-ip is better then i might change to no-ip, i truly think hamacahi is more popular because people will remember your network and they can chat to you when it’s offline or online or ask you questions or tell you if it’s crashed, but i dont know why hamachi is so much more popular and if you think no-ip is better please post the site or how to get it below were everyone else talks, please post in here thank you very much

-shadow hearts.[/quote]Hamachi i think is more annoying…
